entities.name: he
entities.description: The person who is buying drinks and has the dragon egg. He is described as someone who wants to make sure that the dragon egg goes to a good home.

entities.name: dragon egg
entities.description: An object that can be played cards for. It is described as something valuable and not to be taken lightly.

entities.name: Fluffy
entities.description: A dragon that the speaker has experience with, implying that they are confident in their ability to handle a new dragon.

relationships.description: He has possession of the dragon egg and is considering letting the speaker play cards for it.
The speaker has experience handling a dragon, specifically Fluffy.
